TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComEventsHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods that enable .NET Framework delegates that handle events to be added and removed from COM objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Combine (object rcw, Guid iid, int dispid, Delegate d);
.method public static hidebysig void Combine(object rcw, valuetype System.Guid iid, int32 dispid, class System.Delegate d) cil managed

Docs.param: The COM object that triggers the events the caller would like to respond to.
The identifier of the source interface used by the COM object to trigger events.
The dispatch identifier of the method on the source interface.
The delegate to invoke when the COM event is fired.
Docs.summary: Adds a delegate to the invocation list of events originating from a COM object.
Docs.permission: Requires full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Delegate Remove (object rcw, Guid iid, int dispid, Delegate d);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Delegate Remove(object rcw, valuetype System.Guid iid, int32 dispid, class System.Delegate d) cil managed

Docs.param: The COM object the delegate is attached to.
The identifier of the source interface used by the COM object to trigger events.
The dispatch identifier of the method on the source interface.
The delegate to remove from the invocation list.
Docs.summary: Removes a delegate from the invocation list of events originating from a COM object.
Docs.returns: The delegate that was removed from the invocation list.
Docs.permission: Requires full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
